subject: Fashion
title: Hubert de Givenchy and Audrey
description: A 60-second lesson on Hubert de Givenchy and Audrey.

hook.text: Audrey Hepburn walked into Givenchy's studio in 1953. He was expecting Katharine Hepburn instead.

buildup.text: Despite the mix-up, Givenchy dressed Audrey for the film 'Sabrina.' A legendary partnership began.

twist.text: Hepburn wore Givenchy in her personal life too. She wasn't playing a roleâ€”she was being herself.

climax.text: Their friendship lasted 40 years. When she died, he designed the flowers for her funeral.

punchline.text: The greatest fashion partnership started with a wrong name.
